titles.title: A resolution authorizing use of the Hart Building atrium for a concert by the Congressional chorus.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 10/20/1988--Introduced. Authorizes the use of the Senate Hart Office Building during the week of December 12, 1988, for a concert of American and holiday music presented by the Congressional Chorus.
